newsitem.title: USA: Candlewood Hotel says growth plan on track.
newsitem.headline: Candlewood Hotel says growth plan on track.

text.p: Candlewood Hotel Co Inc said Monday its growth plan for 1997 is on track with the opening of two extended-stay hotels and 12 other hotels under construction in the first quarter.
Candlewood, which expects the hotels under construction to open by the end of the year, said it is on target to open 19 hotels and have another 20 under construction by 1998.
The hotel developer said it currently has three hotels in operation, 17 company-owned properties in the construction phase and 29 additional sites under contract.
Candlewood shares were unchanged Monday at 10.
